name: fslswapdim
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Swap dimensions of an image volume

inputs.description: New x-axis dimension (e.g., -x, x, RL, etc.)
inputs.name: X-axis dimension

inputs.description: New y-axis dimension (e.g., -y, y, PA, etc.)
inputs.name: Y-axis dimension

inputs.description: New z-axis dimension (e.g., -z, z, IS, etc.)
inputs.name: Z-axis dimension

inputs.description: Output image (e.g., output.nii.gz). If not specified, the equivalent transformation matrix is written to the standard output.
inputs.name: Output file
